商品名稱: SheLucki 夏威夷男款襯衫,中性夏季海灘休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫,印花棕櫚陰影服裝
SKU: 顏色: 花藍尺寸: 3X-Large
留言內容: he SheLucki Hawaiian Shirt for Men is an absolute treasure for anyone looking to infuse their wardrobe with a splash of paradise. This unisex summer beach casual short sleeve button-down shirt has become my go-to choice for a laid-back, stylish look that's perfect for those sunny days.First and foremost, the design is eye-catching and vibrant. The Hawaiian patterns are fun and exude the essence of summer. I chose the one with palm trees and hibiscus flowers, and it instantly transported me to a tropical paradise, even if I was just wearing it in my own backyard.The shirt's fit is comfortable and relaxed, ideal for warm weather. The short sleeves and breathable fabric make it perfect for hot summer days. It's a unisex design, and the range of sizes ensures a great fit for everyone. The buttons are secure, and the collar lays nicely for a polished look.The quality of the fabric is exceptional. It's soft, lightweight, and feels fantastic against the skin. It's also easy to care for, which is a big plus for casual summer wear.This Hawaiian shirt is incredibly versatile. Whether you're heading to the beach, a summer BBQ, a luau party, or simply enjoying a leisurely stroll, it's the perfect choice. It's a head-turner, and I've received numerous compliments whenever I've worn it.One of the standout features is its unisex design. My partner and I both own this shirt, and we love the idea that we can match our style and enjoy the tropical vibes together. It's not often that you find unisex clothing that's stylish and comfortable for everyone.In conclusion, the SheLucki Hawaiian Shirt for Men is a fantastic addition to any summer wardrobe. It's fun, comfortable, and offers a taste of the tropics wherever you go. Whether you're male or female, this shirt is perfect for embracing the easygoing spirit of summer. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a stylish and fun fashion statement. It's a five-star shirt that brings a slice of paradise into your everyday life!

商品名稱: SheLucki 夏威夷男款襯衫,中性夏季海灘休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫,印花棕櫚陰影服裝
SKU: 顏色: 巴士黃色尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: Forget overpriced souvenir shirts that feel like cardboard and fade in a wash. The SheLucki Hawaiian Shirt is your new best friend for island-inspired style, comfort, and serious value for money.Buttery-soft [polyester-spandex] blend feels like a dream on your skin, keeping you cool and comfy under the hottest sun. Plus, it dries fast and washes like a champ, so you can keep those tropical vibes flowing all summer long.Vibrant tropical print screams "vacay mode," no matter where you are. I've worn mine to the beach, on hikes, and for casual outings, and it always gets compliments.The real magic, though? The price! This little piece of paradise won't take a huge bite out of of that hard earned paycheck , making it a steal for the quality and comfort you get. I've already worn mine to death (in the best way possible), and it still looks and feels brand new.So ditch the overpriced designer island tat and grab yourself a SheLucki. Your wallet and your wardrobe will thank you.

商品名稱: SheLucki 夏威夷男款襯衫,中性夏季海灘休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫,印花棕櫚陰影服裝
SKU: 顏色: 棕櫚樹藍色尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: Great shirts with nice material.  The buttons "pop" nicely in contrast against the other material.  Nicely hemmed sleeves.I ordered one of these and liked it so much I got two other variations.  I've found these all run true to size, contrary to some of the previous reviews I had read stating they run small.

商品名稱: SheLucki 夏威夷男款襯衫,中性夏季海灘休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫,印花棕櫚陰影服裝
SKU: 顏色: Leaf 078 藍色尺寸: Large
留言內容: I got three different colors / styles.  All fit the same, all were made the same, all felt the same, and all were packaged the same - Zip lock with sealed second bag inside it.I machine washed and dried each one and they showed no fading or thread breaks and they did not seem to change shape or shrink.  That said, I got them on Prime day for under $20 so if they give me three nights each I figure they don't owe me anything.  It's not like I am wearing these kind of shirts regularly and they are not likely to be classic wardrobe legacy pieces I hand down.Sizing - Most would guess that these run small but I found them to be true to size.  I am one who drifts between L and XL.  Sometimes an "L" is just a bit too short or tight in the chest and sometimes an "XL" fits like a swimming pool because the body lines drop straight from the armpits.So, at 6'3" and 190 lbs (I wear a 44 L sport coat and a have a 33 waist) I got the large and am happy.  There are just big enough in the chest without being way to wide at the bottom.  The sleeves are cuffed but fall beyond the biceps and the bottom hem covers the belt and the tops of my pant's pocket openings by a few inches.  I would not want them any shorter, but as I also don't want to feel like I am wearing a dress, I think an XL would be slightly too long.

商品名稱: SheLucki 夏威夷男款襯衫,中性夏季海灘休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫,印花棕櫚陰影服裝
SKU: 顏色: 鳳梨黑尺寸: Medium
留言內容: This shirt is great in all details except two to be a real Aloha shirt. The fabric spot on. The colors are perfect. The buttons are probably some of the best. The fit is right, I normally wear a large, but in Aloha shirts I have to get a medium. So that was spot on. So why only four stars? The cut at the bottom is not like a traditional Aloha shirt. This shirt is cut like a dress shirt and not the same length all around the bottom. The advertising picture shows it having the traditional cut at the bottom. What I received was different. Also it has hemmed cuffs on the sleeves. That is not traditional. I keep trying to roll the sleeves back out, LOL. Will I keep the shirt and wear it? Absolutely! I just wish the bottom of the shirt was a traditional cut. It will still be a perfect shirt for hot days. It’s not the end of the world. I just wanted to explain the only reason I gave it four starts. It would have been five starts hands down if it wasn’t for that little detail. 🤙

留言內容: The Shirt is a hit and miss for me. I like the quality of the shirt and is true to size. The colors are very vibrant. It has really nice buttons. The customer support is excellent and very responsive.My reasoning for buying the shirt was for the prominent pineapple pattern on the front and back. Even the title of the shirt describes it as a pineapple shirt. The first shirt I received didn't have a pineapple; or at least you couldn't tell it was a pineapple due to how the garment was put together. The pineapple is so obscure, people didn't recognise it and thought it was part of a palm tree.Customer support was great to deal with. They responded right away and was very apologetic. Customer support had me keep the shirt, offered me a free replacement and my money back. This is amazing; all I wanted was a replacement.The second shirt arrived and I come to find out that there are no pineapples visible either. There is definitely some quality issues when it comes to centering the patterns. The Shirt arrived sealed, so I imagine no one can check the pattern once the shirt is inventoried.I'm still waiting on my money back, but I'm sure it's on its way.
